name: Suzaku Aqua

aura.name: wings_of_water
aura.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Enhances Water attacks while mounted.

description: It was once believed to usher in the rainy season. If there was a flood the previous year, people would relentlessly seek to cull its numbers, hoping to avert disaster in the coming year.

skills.name: hydro_jet
skills.description: Hurls a high speed ball of water at an enemy.

skills.name: ice_missile
skills.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

skills.name: aqua_gun
skills.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

skills.name: cryst_breath
skills.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: aqua_burst
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: blizzard_spike
skills.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.

skills.name: hydro_laser
skills.description: Shoots pressurized water at extreme velocities, sweeping over a wide area in front of it.
